resources.string: This app is intended to be an educational tool for learning a bit about finances (loans, currency exchange, stocks.) The purpose of this project is to create an application that will exercise what our team (see below) have learned about the Android framework and Mobile software development
Lara M, Nicholas A, John P, Danny M
19 years old, loves math and algorithms, can solve any problem
Get to know John Pesce more at @johnPesce on gitlab

Get to know Danny more at @danny on gitlab
20 years old, codes with in a fast an efficient manner in multiple languages
19 years old, loves design and creating websites/apps on any platform
21 years old, great with logic and data structures
Final project for the Android Course(420-517-DW) with Patricia Campbell, Dawson College
